_pageTitle.comment: Page title displayed in the browser tab
_myRequestsTitle.comment: List header title for list of requests for assistance assigned to the user
_requestsTitle.comment: List header title for list of requests for assistance assigned or not yet assigned to other users
_closedRequestsTitle.comment: List header title for list of closed requests for assistance assigned or not yet assigned to other users

requestListColumns.name: Name

requestListColumns._status.comment: Status column header of the list
requestListColumns._closedDate.comment: Closed Date column header of the list
requestListColumns._lastUpdatedBy.comment: Last Updated By column header of the list
requestListColumns._specialist.comment: Assigned specialist column header of the list

requestListRowActions._claim.comment: Row action button text for claiming a request
requestListRowActions._edit.comment: Row action button text for editing a request

requestPageTopButtons._newRequestTitle.comment: Title of the new request page top button

requestPageTopButtons._newClientTitle.comment: Title of the new client page top button
requestPageTopButtons._newClientButtonName.comment: Button name for the new client page top button

requestStatus._notStarted.comment: Status label for Not Started request
requestStatus._inProgress.comment: Status label for In Progress request
requestStatus._local.comment: Status label for request reated locally and not sync with the server yet

addRequestFields._addEndDatePlaceholder.comment: Placeholder text for Add Due Date field
